generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, separated by poles, where pedestrians are walking.
- building: Several multi-story buildings are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: There is grass and soil visible in the area behind the sidewalk fence.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road and one is driving in the distance.
- truck: A white truck is parked on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A parking information sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, including those supporting the traffic sign.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- bicycle: A person is riding a bicycle on the sidewalk.
